translations.sourceText: У амурского тигра Бориса, в выпуске на волю которого в 2015 году участвовал президент РФ Владимир Путин, нашел подругу
translations.translatedText: An Amur tiger Boris, who was released in 2015 to release Vladimir Putin, found his girlfriend.
translations.correctedText: An Amur tiger, Boris, in whose release in 2015 Russian president Vladimir Putin participated, found a girlfriend.

translations.sourceText: В Хабаровском крае ловят людоеда весом 200 кг
translations.translatedText: A cannibal weighing 200 kg is caught in the Khabarovsk Territory
translations.correctedText: A man-eater weighing 200 kg is being pursued in the Khabarovsk Territory

translations.sourceText: По следу тигра-людоеда идет следственная группа.
translations.translatedText: On the trail of the cannibal tiger is an investigation team.
translations.correctedText: On the trail of the man-eating tiger is an investigative team.
